trends: There have been 74 other sightings in St Louis
There was one other sighting in St Louis on or around June 18th 1985
Summary: looked like a spherical rubiks cube. had flashing colored lights.no noise.
divs: Sighting Detailssome friends and i were camping in my parents back yard.somehow me and one freind noticed this thing in the sky.i think we new right off the bat that it was something that didnt belong here.i just remember looking at itin the sky and not hearing any noise.i really dont remember how long we looked at it,and i dont remember if it flew off or just disapaered.i remember being scared after we got back in the tent.me and the friend didnt really talk about it much until we were in high school and then we didnt say much.i havent talked to him in about 15 years but i do know he is some type of physician in san antonio.i think that i really just wanted to confirm that he seen it also.
